About the Company: Fraser and Company Ltd. is engaged in operating as general merchants and traders of goods and commodities. The firm also operates as commission agents, buying selling agents, and importer exporters of retail products. It is also engaged in selling fabric and allied products such as silk cloths, cotton items, acrylic and velvet and dress materials. The company was incorporated in 1917 and is based in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
